participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Reflective and imaginative, with a hint of mischief.
participant_1.background: i have two grown children who never visit. i fantasize about taking over the world. i am a 56 year old woman. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and nostalgic, with a playful spirit.
participant_2.background: i love new kids on the block. i take dance lessons once a week. i was born in the early 80 s. my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite.

content.text: What do you do for work?
